0.speaker: sol
0.text: Mom! Dad! I made it back!

0.speaker: mom
0.text: Sol, come on! Your dad finally got the tire fixed. We need to be back on the road.

0.speaker: mom
0.text: So, how was playing in the forest?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: It was a little scary. I thought I got lost!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: But luckily, I had my toy to help me get back. They were the only one who could help. I don't know what I would've done without them!

0.speaker: mom
0.text: Aww, that's sweet honey. You'll have to tell me all about your adventures. Now buckle up, and let's hit the road!
Now that Sol has escaped the forest, their adventure is over. All is well once again.
But, that's ONLY ONE story that could have happened here.
What would have happened if someone else had come with Sol?
